t: Amazon PPC: Complete Guide to Sponsored Product Campaign
s: Amazon PPC is an advertising model that helps sellers and brands amplify their product sales online. Sellers can create ad campaigns for their products. And each time a potential customer clicks on the ad, Amazon charges a small fee to the seller.
